items.badge_description: City Swiggers is NYC's premier Upper East Side craft beer shop. We offer 14 beers on tap and a thousand beers, ciders, and meads in cans and bottles. We invite you to sit down and enjoy a pint or a flight, or grab a growler or six-pack to go.

user.bio: Homebrewer, Mountain Biker, Snowboarder and Jeep enthusiast.

beer.beer_description: Our latest in a long line of super-tasty-west coast-inspired-beers-with-video-game references... Cheat Code's flavor profile is a throwback to the heady days of 2005.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 330 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 67!

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 40 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 9!

What's better than enjoying a beer outside with food, music, games all in an enjoyable atmosphere? We couldn't think of anything. That's a beer at 10 different venues with the category of Beer Garden. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Sharp and tasty. Magic in a freaking can.

user.bio: Love beer and all its magic it has to offer.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 93)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 94!

items.badge_description: Happy Untappd anniversary to you! Thanks for sticking around and drinking socially with us. Cheers! That's 10 years on Untappd!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 325 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 66!
